title: PTD Today — Media

items.title: Zip Up, Clip In, Copilot On

ai.summary: Based on the available description, the video highlights Jo discovering the power of Copilot Groups and emphasizes that route planning is made easy. It positions Microsoft Copilot as an AI tool for simplifying planning tasks.
bullets: Video centers on Jo using Copilot Groups.
Primary message: route planning made easy.
Focuses on the capabilities of Microsoft Copilot.
Short-form content with an emphasis on AI-assisted workflows.
takeaways: If route planning is part of your operations, note the video presents Copilot Groups as a tool to simplify that work.
Decision-makers should consider evaluating group-based AI features for collaborative planning workflows.
Short demonstrations like this can help introduce stakeholders to potential AI-driven efficiencies.

items.title: Audyt w erze AI: praktyczne zastosowania i realne korzyści | Katarzyna Chojniak, Alicja Barska

ai.summary: Based on the available description… AI in audit is presented as a current, practical toolset that helps audit teams automate repetitive tasks, analyse full data populations and support decision-making. In the KPMG ON AIR episode Katarzyna Chojniak and Alicja Barska describe concrete tools (AI Transaction Scoring Tool, Clara AI, KPMG Clara), client benefits, changing auditor competencies and implementation challenges including data security and regulation.
bullets: Praktyczne zastosowania: AI Transaction Scoring Tool, Clara AI (asystent konwersacyjny) i platforma KPMG Clara.
Przejście od próbkowania do analizy pełnych populacji danych w badaniu.
Wsparcie AI w dokumentacji, analizie ujawnień i zarządzaniu badaniem w czasie rzeczywistym.
Lepsza komunikacja z klientem przez Clara for Clients.
Wyzwania: adaptacja audytorów, bezpieczeństwo danych i środowisko regulacyjne.
takeaways: Audyt będzie coraz bardziej oparty na pełnych analizach danych — przygotuj dostępność i jakość danych operacyjnych.
Systemy AI wymuszają silne praktyki zabezpieczeń i zgodności — priorytet dla infrastruktury i kontroli dostępu.
Real‑time management i lepsza komunikacja z klientem mogą skrócić cykle audytu — warto ocenić integrację z własnymi systemami.
Zmiana kompetencji audytorów (umiejętności analityczne i technologiczne) oznacza konieczność szkoleń lub zmian w zasobach ludzkich.

items.title: Arknights: Endfield | 4K NVIDIA DLSS 4 Launch Trailer

ai.summary: Based on the available description… Arknights: Endfield has officially launched and the trailer highlights NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation. The game is a 3D real-time strategy RPG; the trailer footage was captured on a GeForce RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra settings using DLSS 4 Multi Frame Generation 4X Mode.
bullets: Trailer emphasizes NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation.
Game is a 3D real-time strategy RPG where you play the Endministrator on Talos-II.
Footage captured on GeForce RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra with DLSS 4 MFG 4X Mode.
Description includes links to the game site and social channels.
takeaways: DLSS 4 Multi Frame Generation presence highlights adoption of newer AI-driven frame synthesis tech relevant to real-time rendering workloads.
Use of an RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra indicates high-end GPU requirements for capturing and showcasing next-gen visuals—plan GPU capacity accordingly.
Ensure infrastructure compatibility with the latest NVIDIA architectures and drivers to support DLSS 4 features.
High-resolution capture with MFG modes may increase demand on GPU memory, encoder throughput, and overall node compute for cloud/streaming workflows.
